column2: can contain only alphanumeric characters, spaces, dashes and underscores.

{u'Fn::Base64': {u'Fn::Join': [u'', [u'#! /bin/bash -v
', u'yum update -y
', u'# Helper function
', u'function error_exit
', u'{
', u'  /opt/aws/bin/cfn-signal -e 1 -r "$1" '', {u'Ref': u'BastionWaitHandle'}, u"'
", u'  exit 1
', u'}
', u'# Install packages
', u'/opt/aws/bin/cfn-init -s ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::StackId'}, u' -r BastionInstance ', u'    --region ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::Region'}, u" || error_exit 'Failed to run cfn-init'
", u'# All is well so signal success
', u'/opt/aws/bin/cfn-signal -e $? -r "BastionInstance setup complete" '', {u'Ref': u'BastionWaitHandle'}, u"'
"]]}}
[{u'Value': {u'Ref': u'AWS::StackId'}, u'Key': u'Application'}, {u'Value': u'Public', u'Key': u'Network'}]

[{u'ToPort': u'65535', u'IpProtocol': u'tcp', u'CidrIp': {u'Fn::FindInMap': [u'StackConfig', u'VPC', u'CIDR']}, u'FromPort': u'0'}, {u'ToPort': u'65535', u'IpProtocol': u'udp', u'CidrIp': {u'Fn::FindInMap': [u'StackConfig', u'VPC', u'CIDR']}, u'FromPort': u'0'}, {u'ToPort': u'-1', u'IpProtocol': u'icmp', u'CidrIp': {u'Fn::FindInMap': [u'StackConfig', u'VPC', u'CIDR']}, u'FromPort': u'-1'}]

must begin with a letter and contain only alphanumeric characters.
Lockdown SSH access to the bastion host (default can be accessed from anywhere)

"]]}}
must be a valid CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

{u'Fn::Join': [u'', [u'ssh -i /path/to/', {u'Ref': u'KeyName'}, u'.pem', u" -oProxyCommand='ssh -i /path/to/", {u'Ref': u'KeyName'}, u'.pem -W %h:%p ec2-user@', {u'Ref': u'BastionDNSRecord'}, u"'", u' ec2-user@<private-ip>']]}
